name: Kit's Adventure!
description:
An ARPG for the Secret Santa Game Jam 2022

Created for Mingulino. Merry Christmas!

ARROW KEYS - Move

Z - Attack

X - Use Items

CTRL - Toggle between items

Space Bar - Roll / Interact

R - Restart the game

ALT + ENTER - Fullscreen
